price: Mwenyezi Mungu, hapana mungu isipo kuwa Yeye. Na juu ya Mwenyezi Mungu nawategemee Waumini.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu, hapana wa kuabudiwa kwa haki isipo kuwa Yeye tu peke yake. Basi Waumini nawamtegemee Yeye tu katika mambo yao yote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
